title: As a User, I want the E-Sig status modal updated
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
GIVEN a user is attempting to e-sign an Add C or NOD
custom_steps:
WHEN the user initiates the e-sign process
AND the status modal displays
custom_expected:
THEN the E-sig Status modal should have its layout updated to match the wire
AND the modal should feature the date the document was signed
ANd the modal should feature the date the email was sent
AND the modal should feature the email address the document was sent to
AND the modal should feature the date the document was read

title: As a User, I want Outright Trade Rules updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
See: [C214171] and https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/126264885 for old outright TRD rules
GIVEN Outright Trade rules have been updated to not check if Trade Waivers are needed
custom_steps: WHEN a user attempts to create, submit to club, submit to boc, reject, approve, save, or do anything with an outright trade OR waiver claim assignment
custom_expected: THEN there should never be an error stating Trade Waivers are required, as they no longer exist

title: As a User, I want the System Dates screen updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers section of the System Dates screen
custom_expected:
THEN Trade Assignment Waivers dates should be removed for 2019 and future years
BUT TRD waiver dates for years earlier than 2019 should remain the same
AND OR waiver secured process should still work correctly after this change

title: As a User, I want the Waiver Expiration Batch updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
AND user is attempting to expire secured waivers
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waiver expiration batch screen
custom_expected: THEN "Trade" should be removed as an option in the Type dropdown of the Waiver Expiration Batch

title: As a User, I want Request / Result Bulletins updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds: GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user sends or views or attempts to do anything with Waiver Request or Result bulletins
custom_expected:
THEN no TRD waiver info should display on either bulletin
AND the "No TRD" version of the request and result bulletin emails should no longer be sent

title: As a User, I want Reports updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
WHEN user runs reports in EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN user runs a report in EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the Trade Waiver Tracker report should no longer be available in the reporting widget for club or BOC
AND on the Player Info Summary report:
 - Trade Waivers In Effect column should be removed
 - Trade Waivers column should be removed
AND on the Waiver Request Bulletin report(printed from Waivers screen and Reporting widget):
 - "Include Trade Waivers" prompt should be removed
AND on the Waiver Result Bulletin report(printed from Waivers screen and Reporting widget): 
 - "Include Trade Waivers" prompt should be removed

title: As a User, I want the Emails Utility Updated to Remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_utility
GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers section of the email utility
custom_expected:
THEN the "Send Notification, No TRDs" row in the Notification box should be removed
AND the "Send Notification, No TRDs" column under Recipients should be removed
AND UI should be re-worked to have just Request Bulletin Notification and Result Bulletin Notification
AND any users that have "Send Notification, No TRDs" set but not the other, should have the other set for them

title: As a User, I want the Trade Checklist updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN TRD waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
AND an outright(trade) tx exists for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to print a trade checklist from the outright
custom_expected: THEN  the Trade Waiver section should be removed from the Trade Checklist

title: As a User, I want the Waivers Screen updated to remove Trade Waivers
custom_preconds:
Wires:
https://4why3k.axshare.com/#p=enter_a_waiver_request
https://4why3k.axshare.com/#p=withdrawal_period
https://4why3k.axshare.com/#p=ribbon
GIVEN "TRD" is no longer a valid type of waiver request
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN the TRD option should be no longer be available from the waiver type dropdown on new waiver requests
AND withdrawal Process section should no longer be shown on the page
AND the date/status ribbon at the top of the screen should only have 3 cells

title: As a User, I want Player Profiles updated to remove trade waivers
custom_preconds:
Wires:
https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=waivers___transactions
GIVEN TRD Waivers are no longer a valid waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers & Trans tab of Pro Player Profiles
custom_expected:
THEN the Trade Assignment Waivers "In Effect" fields should be removed from the In Effect section (both fields)
AND when printing this tab, the fields should be removed as well

title: As a User, I want ebis' Left Nav reorganized
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_boc_navigation
GIVEN the leftnav has been reorganized
custom_expected:
THEN "System Dates" should be renamed "System"
AND system should contain the following subnavs:
  -- Batches
  -- Club System Dates
  -- EBIS Link
  -- Emails
  -- LRD
  -- System Dates
  -- User Accounts
  -- WLP Users
AND Utilities should contain the following:
  -- Affiliates
  -- Agents & Agencies
  -- Club Reaffiliation
  -- Contract Language
  -- File Attachments
  -- MN Insurance

title: As a User, I want Employees moved into it's own left nav link
custom_preconds:
Wire:
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=club_boc_navigation
GIVEN there is a new Employees left nav link
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to navigate to Employees via the leftnav
custom_expected:
THEN the new Employees link should be located between CSP/CEP and System links
AND there should be 5 sublinks:
  -- Rosters
  -- Contracts
  -- Translators
  -- Doctors
  -- Permission Requests
 AND each sublink should have the widget of the same name moved from the old Roster -> Employees tab
AND there should no longer be an Employees tab under the Rosters dashboard

title: Rewrite MJC Stat Batch to use BAM Stats API
custom_preconds:
Wiki: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MJC+Stat+batch
GIVEN MJC stat batch has been rewritten to utilize the BAM Stats API
AND Approved MJCs containing performance bonuses exist for the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the MJC stat batch in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN the batch performance will be improved from before
AND batch will mark bonuses earned or not based on wiki requirements above
AND batch should still work correctly for each Performance Bonus type
